AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Federico Saldana: driver of the truck and trailer, answered questions from Haston and Cox, showed signs of nervousness but denied presence of drugs, gave consent to search the truck and trailer without hesitation, a previously convicted felon experienced with the criminal justice system, defendant in a motion to suppress
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Gary Haston: narcotics investigator who asked Saldana many questions, became more aggressive as suspicions grew, applied pressure to elicit cooperation, obtained consent to search from Saldana, an officer who asked questions regarding consent, developed additional reasonable suspicion of potential drug trafficking
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Daniel Martin Huerta: registered owner of the trailer's license plate, possibly involved in hauling a scissor lift for $300, mentioned by Saldana as the owner
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Daniel A. Huerta: registered owner of the truck's license plate
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jason Cox: officer involved in the traffic stop, engaged in a cooperative conversation with Saldana, had reasonable suspicion Saldana had committed a traffic violation, developed additional reasonable suspicion of potential drug trafficking through observations and conversations with Saldana
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Daniel: owner of the truck and trailer, first name mentioned by Federico Saldana
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Gary Haston and Jason Cox and Heather Va: officers involved in the traffic stop and investigation of Saldana, continued examining the truck and trailer, retrieved twenty four bundles of a compressed white powder that field-tested positive for cocaine
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Josiah Bennett: K-9 handler involved in the search of the truck and trailer, testified about the dog's alerts, understood from the officers that Saldana had given consent to search, used the dog again to search the trailer and the bed of the truck before returning the dog to the patrol car
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Gary Haston and Jason Cox: officers involved in the traffic stop and investigation of Saldana, received consent to search the truck and trailer, temporarily detained Saldana due to increasing suspicions of drug trafficking
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jason Cox and Gary Haston: officers involved in the traffic stop and investigation of Saldana, received consent to search the truck and trailer, temporarily detained Saldana due to increasing suspicions of drug trafficking, discovered secreted cocaine
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Gary Haston and Jason Cox and Josiah Ben: officers involved in the traffic stop and investigation of Saldana, continued examining the truck and trailer, retrieved twenty four bundles of a compressed white powder that field-tested positive for cocaine
